timeline.message:
Add benchmark tests for small from/to/source values.

Translate uses char array instead of StringBuilder

timeline.author: seut

timeline.bodyText: Don't think that this improve anything, I'd suggest to use DataTypes.STRING.getTypeSignature() directly below.
timeline.author: seut

timeline.bodyText: Looks like this should be private accessible only?
timeline.author: seut

timeline.bodyText: Any reason to store this into a local var?
timeline.author: seut
seut
seut

timeline.bodyText: Thanks for that. I think this is only interesting for now but has no real benefit of keeping it, so I think we shouldn't commit it.
timeline.author: seut

timeline.message:
Add scalar function translate

Translate performs several single-character, one-to-one translation in one operation.
E.g. translate('Crate', 'Ct', 'Dk') == 'Drake'
